channel.title: A few questions for advanced coders
channel.description:
1: Item Level Requirements OK, when I equip a dragon scimitar, on my server, I need 60 attack. When I equip a halberd, I need 60 [b]defence[/b]. IDK how that was possible. How can I solve it?
2: Port-forwarding I did everything I need in order to port-forward. Still, nobody can log into my server. How can I solve it?
3: Ranging I did Dell's [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,96713.0.html]Full Range[/url] tutorial, for the working of arrows dropping. I did Palidino76's [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,128498.0.html]Range Projectiles[/url] for the arrow animation of normal bows and Crystal Bow. When I attack something, the arrow only appears once. Then it's gone. It doesn't continue, unless I click on the npc/player again. How can I solve this?
4: Anti-lag I assume that you've heard of [b]ZdiddyScape[/b]. Around a month ago, there was a poll on which server was the best. ZdiddyScape was ranked [b]1[/b]. That server, and all the other popular servers have a special anti-lag code. Whenever I [b]mass click[/b] on training objects, such as dummies, on their server, it doesn't lag. My server lags when I do hat. What's the code or link to a tutorial that solves this problem?

item.title: A few questions for advanced coders
item.dc:creator: @NexondotNet NexondotNet
item.description:
@NexondotNet wrote:

yppman:

3) Your code to make animation appear uses a playerEmote = ; which is stupid, and proves whoever made that tut didn’t know how to code. For animations involving holding items such as that, you must use a startAnimation. I dont know the startAnimation codes for ranging, there was a way to convert the emotes into startanim codes with a formula, but I forgot it, it’s been too long.

It’s not a player emote. It has setAnimation.

Read full topic
item.source: A few questions for advanced coders

item.description:
@bobby wrote:

so are any solved yet?

item.dc:creator: @yppman yppman
item.description:
@yppman wrote:

  1. Your code to make animation appear uses a playerEmote = ; which is stupid, and proves whoever made that tut didn’t know how to code. For animations involving holding items such as that, you must use a startAnimation. I dont know the startAnimation codes for ranging, there was a way to convert the emotes into startanim codes with a formula, but I forgot it, it’s been too long.

Read full topic

to

also do this in attack int
all you’re doing is fixing a spelling error in the coding by deleting the letter ‘r’[/quote]

Sorry to tell youthat I tried that ages ago. Note that Dragon battleaxe, dagger, spear all need 60 defence in my server.

item.title: A few questions for advanced coders
item.dc:creator: @NexondotNet NexondotNet
item.description:
@NexondotNet wrote:

[quote="_0wn4g3, post:14, topic:109638"]what? the defence thing I do use it you just gotta add it in here

} else { if (ItemName.startsWith("Bronze")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Iron")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("steel full helm") || ItemName.startsWith("steel med helm") || ItemName.startsWith("steel platebody") || ItemName.startsWith("steel chainbody") || ItemName.startsWith("steel platelegs") || ItemName.startsWith("steel plateskirt") || ItemName.startsWith("steel sq shield") || ItemName.startsWith("steel kiteshield") || ItemName.startsWith("steel boots")) { return 5; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("black full helm") || ItemName.startsWith("black med helm") || ItemName.startsWith("black platebody") || ItemName.startsWith("black chainbody") || ItemName.startsWith("black platelegs") || ItemName.startsWith("black plateskirt") || ItemName.startsWith("black sq shield") || ItemName.startsWith("black kiteshield") || ItemName.startsWith("black boots")) { return 10; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("mithril full helm") || ItemName.startsWith("mithril med helm") || ItemName.startsWith("mithril platebody") || ItemName.startsWith("mithril chainbody") || ItemName.startsWith("mithril platelegs") || ItemName.startsWith("mithril plateskirt") || ItemName.startsWith("mithril sq shield") || ItemName.startsWith("mithril kiteshield") || ItemName.startsWith("mithril boots")) { return 20; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("adamant full helm") || ItemName.startsWith("adamant med helm") || ItemName.startsWith("adamant platebody") || ItemName.startsWith("adamant chainbody") || ItemName.startsWith("adamant platelegs") || ItemName.startsWith("adamant plateskirt") || ItemName.startsWith("adamant sq shield") || ItemName.startsWith("adamant kiteshield") || ItemName.startsWith("adamant boots") || ItemName.startsWith("adam full helm") || ItemName.startsWith("adam platebody") || ItemName.startsWith("adam platelegs") || ItemName.startsWith("adam plateskirt") || ItemName.startsWith("adam kiteshield")) { return 30; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("rune full helm") || ItemName.startsWith("rune med helm") || ItemName.startsWith("rune platebody") || ItemName.startsWith("rune chainbody") || ItemName.startsWith("rune platelegs") || ItemName.startsWith("rune plateskirt") || ItemName.startsWith("rune sq shield") || ItemName.startsWith("rune kiteshield") || ItemName.startsWith("rune boots")) { return 40; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("granite shield") || ItemName.startsWith("granite legs")) { return 50; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("dragon med helm") || ItemName.startsWith("dragon chainbody") || ItemName.startsWith("dragon platelegs") || ItemName.startsWith("dragon plateskirt") || ItemName.startsWith("dragon sq shield")) { return 60; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("dharoks helm") || ItemName.startsWith("dharoks platebody") || ItemName.startsWith("dharoks platelegs") || ItemName.startsWith("torags helm") || ItemName.startsWith("torags platebody") || ItemName.startsWith("torags platelegs") || ItemName.startsWith("veracs helm") || ItemName.startsWith("veracs brassard") || ItemName.startsWith("veracs plateskirt") || ItemName.startsWith("guthans helm") || ItemName.startsWith("guthans platebody") || ItemName.startsWith("guthans chainskirt") || ItemName.startsWith("new crystal shield") || ItemName.startsWith("crystal shield")) { return 70;
Add it in any random spot like add what i said to under here

} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Iron")) { return 1; [/quote]

You mean to change the items in the defence int to the code above ^ and leave the other ints such as attack and strength int alone?

EDIT: I did add that code above ^. Now I can equip dragon armour at level 1 defence. It doesn’t seem to work.

Try that code for yourself to see if it works on your server.

Read full topic

item.title: A few questions for advanced coders
item.dc:creator: @NexondotNet NexondotNet
item.description:
@NexondotNet wrote:

If you look at my code, I have this already -

String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID); String ItemName2 = ItemName.replaceAll("Bronze", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Iron", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Steel", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Black", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Mithril", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Adamant", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Rune", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Granite", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Dragon", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("White", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Crystal", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.trim(); if (ItemName2.startsWith("claws") || ItemName2.startsWith("dagger") || ItemName2.startsWith("sword") || ItemName2.startsWith("scimitar") || ItemName2.startsWith("mace") || ItemName2.startsWith("longsword") || ItemName2.startsWith("battleaxe") || ItemName2.startsWith("warhammer") || ItemName2.startsWith("2h sword") || ItemName2.startsWith("harlberd")) {

It doesn’t matter what source I use, nearly every server I go to has that problem. Try it with your server.

Read full topic

item.description:

Hmm, what’s your source?

} else { if (ItemName.startsWith("Bronze")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Iron")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("steel full helm") || ItemName.startsWith("steel med helm") || ItemName.startsWith("steel platebody") || ItemName.startsWith("steel chainbody") || ItemName.startsWith("steel platelegs") || ItemName.startsWith("steel plateskirt") || ItemName.startsWith("steel sq shield") || ItemName.startsWith("steel kiteshield") || ItemName.startsWith("steel boots")) { return 5; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("black full helm") || ItemName.startsWith("black med helm") || ItemName.startsWith("black platebody") || ItemName.startsWith("black chainbody") || ItemName.startsWith("black platelegs") || ItemName.startsWith("black plateskirt") || ItemName.startsWith("black sq shield") || ItemName.startsWith("black kiteshield") || ItemName.startsWith("black boots")) { return 10; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("rune full helm") || ItemName.startsWith("rune med helm") || ItemName.startsWith("rune platebody") || ItemName.startsWith("rune chainbody") || ItemName.startsWith("rune platelegs") || ItemName.startsWith("rune plateskirt") || ItemName.startsWith("rune sq shield") || ItemName.startsWith("rune kiteshield") || ItemName.startsWith("rune boots")) { return 40; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("granite shield") || ItemName.startsWith("granite legs")) { return 50; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("dragon med helm") || ItemName.startsWith("dragon chainbody") || ItemName.startsWith("dragon platelegs") || ItemName.startsWith("dragon plateskirt") || ItemName.startsWith("dragon sq shield")) { return 60; Did you add the thing I use with this or

String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID); String ItemName2 = ItemName.replaceAll("Bronze", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Iron", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Steel", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Black", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Mithril", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Adamant", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Rune", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Granite", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Dragon", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("White", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Crystal", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.trim(); if (ItemName2.startsWith("claws") || ItemName2.startsWith("dagger") || ItemName2.startsWith("sword") || ItemName2.startsWith("scimitar") || ItemName2.startsWith("mace") || ItemName2.startsWith("longsword") || ItemName2.startsWith("battleaxe") || ItemName2.startsWith("warhammer") || ItemName2.startsWith("2h sword") || ItemName2.startsWith("harlberd")) {

item.title: A few questions for advanced coders
item.dc:creator: @NexondotNet NexondotNet
item.description:
@NexondotNet wrote:

[code][quote="_0wn4g3, post:8, topic:109638"]nope looks fine to me…
just add it where i told you in

public int GetCLDefence(int ItemID) {

My bad, that above one ^ was a test. Too bad it didn’t work. It made all the item level requirements to 1. I don’t know how.

This is my old one -

public int GetCLAttack(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == -1) { return 1; } String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID); String ItemName2 = ItemName.replaceAll("Bronze", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Iron", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Steel", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Black", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Mithril", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Adamant", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Rune", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Granite", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Dragon", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Crystal", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.trim(); if (ItemName2.startsWith("claws") || ItemName2.startsWith("dagger") || ItemName2.startsWith("sword") || ItemName2.startsWith("scimitar") || ItemName2.startsWith("mace") || ItemName2.startsWith("longsword") || ItemName2.startsWith("battleaxe") || ItemName2.startsWith("warhammer") || ItemName2.startsWith("2h sword") || ItemName2.startsWith("harlberd")) { if (ItemName.startsWith("Bronze")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Iron")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Steel")) { return 5; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Black")) { return 120; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Mithril")) { return 20; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Adamant")) { return 30; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Rune")) { return 40; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon")) { return 60; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("White")) { return 120; } } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Granite")) { return 50; } else if (ItemName.endsWith("whip") || ItemName.endsWith("Veracs flail") || ItemName.endsWith("Guthans warspear")) { return 70; } return 1; } public int GetCLDefence(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == -1) { return 1; } String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID); String ItemName2 = ItemName.replaceAll("Bronze", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Iron", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Steel", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Black", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Mithril", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Adamant", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Rune", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Granite", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Dragon", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("White", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Crystal", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.trim(); if (ItemName2.startsWith("claws") || ItemName2.startsWith("dagger") || ItemName2.startsWith("sword") || ItemName2.startsWith("scimitar") || ItemName2.startsWith("mace") || ItemName2.startsWith("longsword") || ItemName2.startsWith("battleaxe") || ItemName2.startsWith("warhammer") || ItemName2.startsWith("2h sword") || ItemName2.startsWith("harlberd")) { //It's a weapon, weapons don't required defence ! } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Ahrims") || ItemName.startsWith("Karil") || ItemName.startsWith("Torag") || ItemName.startsWith("Verac") || ItemName.endsWith("Guthan") || ItemName.endsWith("Dharok")) { if (ItemName.endsWith("staff") || ItemName.endsWith("crossbow") || ItemName.endsWith("hammers") || ItemName.endsWith("flail") || ItemName.endsWith("warspear") || ItemName.endsWith("greataxe")) { //No defence for the barrow weapons } else { return 70; } } else { if (ItemName.startsWith("Bronze")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Iron")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Steel")) { return 5; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Black")) { return 120; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Mithril")) { return 20; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Adamant")) { return 30; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Rune")) { return 40; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon")) { return 60; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("White")) { return 120; } } return 1; } public int GetCLStrength(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == -1) { return 1; } String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID); if (ItemName.startsWith("Granite")) { return 50; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Torags hammers") || ItemName.endsWith("Dharoks greataxe")) { return 70; } return 1; }

[code]actionTimer =30;[/code] The number 30 is only an example you can change the 30 to whatever you want. If I'm wrong tell me because it works for me...

I have that…[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: A few questions for advanced coders

item.title: A few questions for advanced coders
item.dc:creator: @_0wn4g3 _0wn4g3
item.description:
@_0wn4g3 wrote:

case 299: if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) { if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("you search the Hay bale..."); addSkillXP((10*playerLevel[1]), 1); addSkillXP((10*playerLevel[18]), 18); actionTimer = 30; setAnimation(0x320); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; sendMessage("but you fine nothing =("); } } break;
That’s one of my cases. For the timer you gotta have

if(actionTimer == 0) or something like that
and a bit down you gotta have

actionTimer =30; The number 30 is only an example you can change the 30 to whatever you want. If I’m wrong tell me because it works for me…
Pretty much have them in the same spots I do

Read full topic

item.description:
@NexondotNet wrote:

Eh Pretty Easy:

Search for case 1531 and then you see this in there if(actionTimer == 0) change the 0 to 5.

I did that. I mass clicked on it for 20 seconds. Nothing happens.

Look at this -

public int GetCLAttack(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == -1) { return 1; } String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID); String ItemName2 = ItemName.replaceAll("Bronze", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Iron", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Steel", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Black", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Mithril", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Adamant", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Rune", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Granite", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Dragon", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Crystal", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.trim(); if (ItemName2.startsWith("claws") || ItemName2.startsWith("dagger") || ItemName2.startsWith("sword") || ItemName2.startsWith("scimitar") || ItemName2.startsWith("mace") || ItemName2.startsWith("longsword") || ItemName2.startsWith("battleaxe") || ItemName2.startsWith("warhammer") || ItemName2.startsWith("2h sword") || ItemName2.startsWith("harlberd")) { if (ItemName.startsWith("Bronze")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Iron")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("steel axe") || ItemName.startsWith("steel battleaxe") || ItemName.startsWith("steel mace") || ItemName.startsWith("steel dagger") || ItemName.startsWith("steel sword") || ItemName.startsWith("steel longsword") || ItemName.startsWith("steel scimitar") || ItemName.startsWith("steel pickaxe") || ItemName.startsWith("steel spear") || ItemName.startsWith("steel 2h") || ItemName.startsWith("steel halberd")) { return 5; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("black axe") || ItemName.startsWith("black battleaxe") || ItemName.startsWith("black mace") || ItemName.startsWith("black dagger") || ItemName.startsWith("black sword") || ItemName.startsWith("black longsword") || ItemName.startsWith("black scimitar") || ItemName.startsWith("black spear") || ItemName.startsWith("black 2h") || ItemName.startsWith("black halberd")) { return 10; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("mithril axe") || ItemName.startsWith("mithril battleaxe") || ItemName.startsWith("mithril mace") || ItemName.startsWith("mithril dagger") || ItemName.startsWith("mithril sword") || ItemName.startsWith("mithril longsword") || ItemName.startsWith("mithril scimitar") || ItemName.startsWith("mithril pickaxe") || ItemName.startsWith("mithril spear") || ItemName.startsWith("mithril 2h") || ItemName.startsWith("mithril halberd")) { return 20; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("adamant axe") || ItemName.startsWith("adamant battleaxe") || ItemName.startsWith("adamant mace") || ItemName.startsWith("adamant dagger") || ItemName.startsWith("adamant sword") || ItemName.startsWith("adamant longsword") || ItemName.startsWith("adamant scimitar") || ItemName.startsWith("adamant pickaxe") || ItemName.startsWith("adamant spear") || ItemName.startsWith("adamant 2h") || ItemName.startsWith("adamant halberd")) { return 30; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("rune axe") || ItemName.startsWith("rune battleaxe") || ItemName.startsWith("rune mace") || ItemName.startsWith("rune dagger") || ItemName.startsWith("rune sword") || ItemName.startsWith("rune longsword") || ItemName.startsWith("rune scimitar") || ItemName.startsWith("rune pickaxe") || ItemName.startsWith("rune spear") || ItemName.startsWith("rune 2h") || ItemName.startsWith("rune halberd")) { return 40; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Granite maul")) { return 50; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("dragon axe") || ItemName.startsWith("dragon battleaxe") || ItemName.startsWith("dragon mace") || ItemName.startsWith("dragon dagger") || ItemName.startsWith("dragon longsword") || ItemName.startsWith("dragon scimitar") || ItemName.startsWith("dragon spear") || ItemName.startsWith("dragon 2h") || ItemName.startsWith("dragon halberd")) { return 60; } else if (ItemName.endsWith("whip")) { return 70; } } return 1; } public int GetCLDefence(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == -1) { return 1; } String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID); String ItemName2 = ItemName.replaceAll("Bronze", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Iron", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Steel", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Black", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Mithril", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Adamant", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Rune", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Granite", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Dragon", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("White", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Crystal", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.trim(); if (ItemName2.startsWith("claws") || ItemName2.startsWith("dagger") || ItemName2.startsWith("sword") || ItemName2.startsWith("scimitar") || ItemName2.startsWith("mace") || ItemName2.startsWith("longsword") || ItemName2.startsWith("battleaxe") || ItemName2.startsWith("warhammer") || ItemName2.startsWith("2h sword") || ItemName2.startsWith("harlberd")) { //It's a weapon, weapons don't required defence ! } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Ahrims") || ItemName.startsWith("Karil") || ItemName.startsWith("Torag") || ItemName.startsWith("Verac") || ItemName.endsWith("Guthan") || ItemName.endsWith("Dharok")) { if (ItemName.endsWith("staff") || ItemName.endsWith("crossbow") || ItemName.endsWith("hammers") || ItemName.endsWith("flail") || ItemName.endsWith("warspear") || ItemName.endsWith("greataxe")) { //No defence for the barrow weapons } else { return 70; } } else { if (ItemName.startsWith("Bronze")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Iron")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("steel full helm") || ItemName.startsWith("steel med helm") || ItemName.startsWith("steel platebody") || ItemName.startsWith("steel chainbody") || ItemName.startsWith("steel platelegs") || ItemName.startsWith("steel plateskirt") || ItemName.startsWith("steel sq shield") || ItemName.startsWith("steel kiteshield") || ItemName.startsWith("steel boots")) { return 5; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("black full helm") || ItemName.startsWith("black med helm") || ItemName.startsWith("black platebody") || ItemName.startsWith("black chainbody") || ItemName.startsWith("black platelegs") || ItemName.startsWith("black plateskirt") || ItemName.startsWith("black sq shield") || ItemName.startsWith("black kiteshield") || ItemName.startsWith("black boots")) { return 10; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("mithril full helm") || ItemName.startsWith("mithril med helm") || ItemName.startsWith("mithril platebody") || ItemName.startsWith("mithril chainbody") || ItemName.startsWith("mithril platelegs") || ItemName.startsWith("mithril plateskirt") || ItemName.startsWith("mithril sq shield") || ItemName.startsWith("mithril kiteshield") || ItemName.startsWith("mithril boots")) { return 20; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("adamant full helm") || ItemName.startsWith("adamant med helm") || ItemName.startsWith("adamant platebody") || ItemName.startsWith("adamant chainbody") || ItemName.startsWith("adamant platelegs") || ItemName.startsWith("adamant plateskirt") || ItemName.startsWith("adamant sq shield") || ItemName.startsWith("adamant kiteshield") || ItemName.startsWith("adamant boots") || ItemName.startsWith("adam full helm") || ItemName.startsWith("adam platebody") || ItemName.startsWith("adam platelegs") || ItemName.startsWith("adam plateskirt") || ItemName.startsWith("adam kiteshield")) { return 30; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("rune full helm") || ItemName.startsWith("rune med helm") || ItemName.startsWith("rune platebody") || ItemName.startsWith("rune chainbody") || ItemName.startsWith("rune platelegs") || ItemName.startsWith("rune plateskirt") || ItemName.startsWith("rune sq shield") || ItemName.startsWith("rune kiteshield") || ItemName.startsWith("rune boots")) { return 40; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("granite shield") || ItemName.startsWith("granite legs")) { return 50; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("dragon med helm") || ItemName.startsWith("dragon chainbody") || ItemName.startsWith("dragon platelegs") || ItemName.startsWith("dragon plateskirt") || ItemName.startsWith("dragon sq shield")) { return 60; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("dharoks helm") || ItemName.startsWith("dharoks platebody") || ItemName.startsWith("dharoks platelegs") || ItemName.startsWith("torags helm") || ItemName.startsWith("torags platebody") || ItemName.startsWith("torags platelegs") || ItemName.startsWith("veracs helm") || ItemName.startsWith("veracs brassard") || ItemName.startsWith("veracs plateskirt") || ItemName.startsWith("guthans helm") || ItemName.startsWith("guthans platebody") || ItemName.startsWith("guthans chainskirt") || ItemName.startsWith("new crystal shield") || ItemName.startsWith("crystal shield")) { return 70; } } return 1; } public int GetCLStrength(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == -1) { return 1; } String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID); if (ItemName.startsWith("dharoks greataxe") || ItemName.startsWith("torags hammers") || ItemName.startsWith("guthans warspear") || ItemName.startsWith("veracs flail")) { return 70; } return 1; }

See anything wrong with it? Rofl.

Read full topic

item.title: A few questions for advanced coders
item.dc:creator: @_0wn4g3 _0wn4g3
item.description:
@_0wn4g3 wrote:

For the item level requirments search for this

public int GetCLDefence(int ItemID) {

scroll down until you see

if (ItemName.startsWith("Bronze")) { return 1;
and below it add something like this

} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon halberd")) { return 1;
If i got the name wrong just change the “Dragon halberd” part to the name and the return 1 is the level you want the requirment to be.

item.title: A few questions for advanced coders
item.dc:creator: @NexondotNet NexondotNet
item.description:
@NexondotNet wrote:

1) Search for this [code]if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 3204[/code] the requirements for the halberd is under that.

No, actually the requirements are in these ints -

public int GetCLAttack(int ItemID) { public int GetCLStrength(int ItemID) { public int GetCLDefence(int ItemID) {

I can’t get them to wok properly.

2) After portforwarding you need to setup no-ip or Hamachi.

I did that. I’m not that stupid you know.

3) No idea.

…

4) Timers.

[/quote]

I have actionTimer in those cases though.

Please, do not say “Look for tuts”. That is basically spam and does not help anyone. People aren’t foolish. Of course they check the tutorials first, otherwise why would they post questions?

item.title: A few questions for advanced coders
item.dc:creator: @NexondotNet NexondotNet
item.description:
@NexondotNet wrote:

1: Item Level Requirements
OK, when I equip a dragon scimitar, on my server, I need 60 attack. When I equip a halberd, I need 60 defence. IDK how that was possible. How can I solve it?

2: Port-forwarding
I did everything I need in order to port-forward. Still, nobody can log into my server. How can I solve it?

3: Ranging
I did Dell’s Full Range tutorial, for the working of arrows dropping. I did Palidino76’s Range Projectiles for the arrow animation of normal bows and Crystal Bow. When I attack something, the arrow only appears once. Then it’s gone. It doesn’t continue, unless I click on the npc/player again. How can I solve this?

4: Anti-lag
I assume that you’ve heard of ZdiddyScape. Around a month ago, there was a poll on which server was the best. ZdiddyScape was ranked 1. That server, and all the other popular servers have a special anti-lag code. Whenever I mass click on training objects, such as dummies, on their server, it doesn’t lag. My server lags when I do hat. What’s the code or link to a tutorial that solves this problem?

Read full topic
item.source: A few questions for advanced coders
